description: A terminally ill chemistry teacher teams with a former student to manufacture crystal meth to secure his family's future.
starring: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, and Anna Gunn
creators: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, and Anna Gunn
genres: TV Dramas, US TV Shows, and TV Thrillers
show_characteristics: Violent, Suspenseful, Thriller, Tortured Genius, Critically Acclaimed, Drug Lord, and TV
audio: English - Audio Description, English [Original], and French
cast: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn, Dean Norris, Betsy Brandt, RJ Mitte, Bob Odenkirk, Steven Michael Quezada, Jonathan Banks, and Giancarlo Esposito

Season 1.title: 1. Pilot
Season 1.description: Diagnosed with terminal lung cancer, a high school chemistry teacher resorts to cooking and selling methamphetamine to provide for his family.

Season 1.title: 2. The Cat's in the Bag
Season 1.description: Their first aborted drug deal forces Walt and Jesse to dispose of a pair of corpses. Meanwhile, Skyler suspects that her husband is up to no good.

Season 1.title: 3. And the Bag's in the River
Season 1.description: As Walt cleans up the mess that was left after his first drug deal, Skyler gets too close to the truth about his double life.

Season 1.title: 4. Cancer Man
Season 1.description: Being forced to reveal the truth about his illness leaves Walt facing the dilemma of how to pay for an expensive series of cancer treatments.

Season 1.title: 5. Gray Matter
Season 1.description: Skyler organizes an intervention to persuade Walt to accept his former research partner's generous offer to pay for the cancer treatments.

Season 1.title: 6. Crazy Handful of Nothin'
Season 1.description: With the side effects and cost of his treatment mounting, Walt demands that Jesse find a wholesaler to buy their drugs -- which lands him in trouble.

Season 1.title: 7. A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
Season 1.description: After Jesse's brush with death, Walt agrees to produce even more drugs for the ruthless Tuco. Meanwhile, Skyler suspects her sister of shoplifting.

Season 2.title: 1. Seven Thirty-Seven
Season 2.description: As they lay plans for their final big drug deals, Walt and Jesse worry that their sole buyer will think nothing of killing them when it suits him.

Season 2.title: 2. Grilled
Season 2.description: As a DEA manhunt for Tuco gets under way, Skyler enlists Hank in the search for Walt.

Season 2.title: 3. Bit by a Dead Bee
Season 2.description: As Hank comes dangerously close to uncovering Walt's role in the drug trade, he devises a plan to cover his tracks.

Season 2.title: 4. Down
Season 2.description: With Walt struggling to bridge the growing gulf between him and Skyler, Jesse finds himself without a home after his parents evict him.

Season 2.title: 5. Breakage
Season 2.description: Hank tries to pull himself together after his encounter with Tuco. Meanwhile, Jesse assembles a crew to get more product on the street.

Season 2.title: 6. Peekaboo
Season 2.description: As Jesse pursues the addicts who stole Skinny Pete's drug supply, Walt devises a cover story to explain how he's been paying for his treatments.

Season 2.title: 7. Negro y Azul
Season 2.description: As Jesse's reputation as a drug lord leads Walt to push for expansion of the operation, Hank's foray into the DEA's El Paso office leaves him shaken.

Season 2.title: 8. Better Call Saul
Season 2.description: Badger's arrest forces Walt and Jesse into league with a shady lawyer.

Season 2.title: 9. 4 Days Out
Season 2.description: Worried that he doesn't have much longer to live, Walt looks to provide for his family by enlisting Jesse for a marathon meth-cooking session.

Season 2.title: 10. Over
Season 2.description: In the wake of good news about his cancer treatments, Walt turns on his brother-in-law before focusing his attention on making things right at home.

Season 3.title: 1. No Más
Season 3.description: Skyler forces Walt to move out in the wake of the airline disaster, while Jesse's rehab helps him come to grips with his role in the collision.

Season 3.title: 2. Caballo Sin Nombre
Season 3.description: With Skyler set on divorce, an unwitting Walt lands squarely in the crosshairs of two Mexican drug cartel hit men who are looking for revenge.

Season 3.title: 3. I.F.T.
Season 3.description: The tension mounts as Walt calls Skyler's bluff and moves back home without her consent, and Jesse ponders re-entering the drug trade.

Season 3.title: 4. Green Light
Season 3.description: Walt gets involved when a new batch of meth puts Jesse back in business. Meanwhile, Skyler's affair with her boss is creating chaos.

Season 3.title: 5. Mas
Season 3.description: As Skyler reconsiders her objections to Walt's return, he mulls over returning to the drug trade. Also, Hank's obsession promises trouble for Jesse.

Season 3.title: 6. Sunset
Season 3.description: The discovery of Walt and Jesse's old RV forces them to act fast just as Walt resumes business in Gus's state-of-the-art meth lab.

Season 3.title: 7. One Minute
Season 3.description: When Hank risks his career by attacking Jesse, Jesse vows to retaliate with a lawsuit, and Skyler looks to Walt to stop Jesse from pressing charges.

Season 3.title: 8. I See You
Season 3.description: With Hank clinging to life after surviving the drug cartel's attack, Walt looks to ward off trouble by taking on Jesse as a partner.

Season 3.title: 9. Kafkaesque
Season 3.description: While the prospects for Hank's recovery place Marie at odds with their insurance company, Jesse looks for a way to increase his take.

Season 3.title: 10. Fly
Season 3.description: A long, tense night in the meth lab pits Walt and Jesse against a pesky fly that refuses to die, no matter what they do.

Season 4.title: 1. Box Cutter
Season 4.description: After a tense cliff-hanger that saw Walt and Jesse labouring for their lives, they wait anxiously to see what Gus will do next.

Season 4.title: 2. Thirty-Eight Snub
Season 4.description: While Walt prepares his defence against Gus, Jesse copes with the pressure by renewing his friendship with Badger and Skinny Pete.

Season 4.title: 3. Open House
Season 4.description: While Walt worries about Gus's interference and Jesse's increasingly fragile state of mind, Skyler steps up the pressure to get what she wants.

Season 4.title: 4. Bullet Points
Season 4.description: As Skyler concocts an elaborate story to explain the Whites' finances, a worried Walt discovers that Hank has begun a new investigation.

Season 4.title: 5. Shotgun
Season 4.description: Jesse rides shotgun with Mike on a perilous run of pickups, prompting Walt to worry that his partner is about to be killed.

Season 4.title: 6. Cornered
Season 4.description: Skyler adopts an aloof approach when she suspects that Walt isn't telling her the truth. Meanwhile, Jesse proves his worth to Mike and Gus.

Season 4.title: 7. Problem Dog
Season 4.description: Ordered to return the car he bought for his son, Walt strikes back by putting Skyler in a tough spot with their new money-laundering operation.

Season 4.title: 8. Hermanos
Season 4.description: When Hank produces evidence that Gus is Albuquerque's crystal meth kingpin, Walt worries that he and Jesse will be killed to protect their boss.

Season 4.title: 9. Bug
Season 4.description: While Walt tries to subvert Hank's probe into the Albuquerque meth scene, a deadly warning forces Gus to consider a deal with the Mexican cartel.

Season 4.title: 10. Salud
Season 4.description: With a badly battered Walt still recovering from the fight, Gus drags Jesse with him to Mexico to seal the deal with the cartel.

Season 5.title: 1. Live Free Or Die
Season 5.description: Walt goes to see his family, still under guard, while dealing with the aftermath of the explosion at Casa Tranquila.

Season 5.title: 2. Madrigal
Season 5.description: Walt and Jesse decide to look for a new partner to help them in their latest scheme. The DEA sifts through various leads, hoping to find something.

Season 5.title: 3. Hazard Pay
Season 5.description: To Skyler's dismay, Walter moves back into the house. Walter, Mike and Jesse meet with Saul to talk about finding a new place to cook.

Season 5.title: 4. Fifty-One
Season 5.description: As Lydia gives up her own employee to the DEA, Mike offers her a replacement: Jesse. Walt and Skyler argue about whether the family is safe.

Season 5.title: 5. Dead Freight
Season 5.description: Mike and Lydia work to get the methylamine transported for the operation. Walt and Jesse try to come up with a plan that won't blow their cover.

Season 5.title: 6. Buyout
Season 5.description: Walt, Mike and Jesse deal with the repercussions of the methylamine heist. Mike and Jesse want out, but Walt is determined to build his empire.

Season 5.title: 7. Say My Name
Season 5.description: Walter tries to strike up a deal with Declan. Told to lay off Mike, Hank switches his focus to the lawyer who's been paying off Mike's men.

Season 5.title: 8. Gliding Over All
Season 5.description: Walt meets with Lydia to get the names of Mike's people in prison. Skyler makes another attempt to convince Walt to give up cooking meth.

Season 5.title: 9. Blood Money
Season 5.description: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.

Season 5.title: 10. Buried
Season 5.description: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.
